dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares interrupt the peace of the midnight elves?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking an alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliance, you say? Midnight elves do not easily trust outsiders, prove your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will demonstrate my loyalty in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions speak louder than words, prove yourself by defeating the treacherous trolls in the northern woods.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will return victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Return only if you survive, victory will grant you our consideration.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowards are not fit to be allies, leave our lands before we mistake you for an enemy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am willing to share valuable knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but can you handle the consequences? Speak carefully, outsider.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my knowledge with respect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect is earned, not given freely. Share your knowledge, prove your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will keep my knowledge to myself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Keeping secrets won't earn you allies, it may only lead you into darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your authority!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from an outsider. If you seek conflict, prepare to face the wrath of the midnight elves.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready for a duel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You shall regret daring to challenge our knights.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my disrespect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't undo your foolishness. Begone before we decide to teach you a harsh lesson.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to trade for resources.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resources, you say? Midnight elves are not merchants, what could you offer that sparks our interest?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I possess rare artifacts from distant lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Artifacts, intriguing. Show us these treasures, but be warned, deceivers are not tolerated here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I present the artifacts for your inspection.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impressive, these artifacts hold power yet unseen by our kind. Let us entertain the idea of a beneficial partnership.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave with my artifacts then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish, outsider. Your departure prevents a potential conflict.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have knowledge of rare herbs and remedies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Nature's secrets, you possess. But do not think of exploiting our land for your own gain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer to share my healing knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Healing is a noble pursuit, share your knowledge with our healers and earn our gratitude.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will keep my knowledge to myself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Selfishness leads to isolation. We will have no further dealings with one who seeks to withhold gifts.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand resources or face consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demand? Threats do not sit well with the midnight elves. Your move is Ill-considered, outsider.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my approach.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies are a start, but mistakes have consequences. Leave now and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take what I desire by force!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish choice, one that seals your fate with the midnight elves.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have come to challenge the mightiest of the elves.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or foolishness? The mightiest of the midnight elves do not engage in pointless battles.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek a duel with your strongest warrior.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You crave combat without reason. We have no interest in entertaining such reckless behavior.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove my strength elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, seek your battles elsewhere and spare yourself from our wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you all!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance will be your downfall. Brace yourself for the consequences of your actions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to learn from the wisest elders.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom is not granted to the unworthy. What makes you think you are deserving of our elders' teachings?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I humbly request guidance to better myself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Humble words carry weight, show us your sincerity and we may grant you a chance to learn.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no need for your wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance blinds you to the opportunities before you. Leave before you regret your choices.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge the authority of the midnight elves!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenges to authority are met with swift retribution. You tread on dangerous ground, outsider.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared to face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it, your fate is sealed by your defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my disrespect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies do not erase the stain of your actions. Leave before you force our hand.
